profile.description:
I am a Full Stack Web Developer passionate about technology, after studying computer science for more than 2 years, I became interested in web development. After finishing an intensive Bootcamp, I became a full stack web developer.

I am a person who likes to achieve goals, work in a team and always learn new things! :)

experience.title: Experience
experience.first-job-description:
I did 2 projects applying the SCRUM methodology, I used different programming languages such as JavaScript and TypeScript.

In the Front End technologies like React, Redux, CSS, MaterialUI and SweetAlert libraries.

In the Back End, NodeJS with Express and NO-SQL databases from mongoDB, additionally I used PassportJs for authentication, Stripe and MercadoPago to create payment gateways, and tools for deploying projects in render and vercel, all these projects, using GIT for versioning.

projects.first-project-description: CoinTracker is an application in which you can follow the price of any cryptocurrency, have a simulated crypto wallet, perform currency exchanges and create custom alerts when a coin reaches an expected value, implements an administrator panel and allows you to register as a user.
projects.second-project-description: Health4u is a medical services project that allows you to purchase appointments with specialists, search, filter, make payments, register with google or email, customize your profile and rate the service.

contactos.SeeYouSoon: I hope to meet you soon!
contactos.developedBy: 2023 - Developed by Alejandro Villegas
